March was a month of weekly ups and downs with two weeks to the positive and two weeks to the negative, but at the end of the month, the stock market will end in positive territory with the exception of the DOW.

The NASDAQ will post its best week of the year with a gain over +3.6% and that will also be the 11th positive week in the last 12. The S&P 500 will have a weekly gain of +2.7% and the DOW brings up the rear with a weekly positive gain over +1%.
